modName: Collect Water from Wells - Expanded Towns and Cities Patch
summary: Allows the new wells added by ETaC to work with the mod 'Collect Water from Wells' by Thicketford.
descriptionHtml:
About: This mod allows the new wells added by ETaC by missjennabee to work with the Collect Water from Wells mod by Thicketford.

Installation: You must have both the original mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/38507/?tab=1&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D38507%26preview%3D&pUp=1]Collect water from wells[/url]ï»¿ installed (the RND version - if people request I will upload a patch for the base version too) and the mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13608/?tab=1&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D13608%26preview%3D&pUp=1]ETaC[/url] installed. Then download this mod - either the normal version or the version including Dragon Bridge South, depending on which one you installed from ETaC - and activate it via NMM. If asked to overwrite any files select 'yes'. Done!
(Place below Collect water from wells and ETaC in your load order)

Credits go to Thicketford for making the original mod Collect water from wells, and to missjennabee for making ETaC.
author: simsim899

files.name: Collect Water from Wells - ETaC Patch
